Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.millicast.android_app.Utils
  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods used in the SA.

    • Method Detail

      • indexNext

        public static java.lang.Integer indexNext​(int size,
                                          int now,
                                          boolean ascending,
                                          java.lang.String logTag)
        Given a list of specified size and the current index, gets the next index. If at end of list, cycle to start of the other end. Returns null if none available.
        Parameters:
        size - Size of the list.
        now - Current index of the list.
        ascending - If true, cycle in the direction of increasing index, otherwise cycle in opposite direction.
        logTag -
        Returns:

      • logD

        public static void logD​(java.lang.String TAG,
                        java.lang.String longString,
                        java.lang.String logTag)
        logcat truncates strings longer than a certain length. This method breaks the input string into smaller chunks of maxLogSize and print them all.
        Parameters:
        TAG -
        longString -
        logTag - An additional tag to include in front of each printed line.

      • logD

        public static void logD​(java.lang.String TAG,

        The same as logD(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) except there is no inclusion of an additional logTag.
        Parameters:
        TAG -
        longString -

      • getArrayStr

        public static <T> java.lang.String getArrayStr​(java.util.List<T> itemList,
                                               java.lang.String separator,
                                               Utils.LambdaToString lambda)
        Get a string representing all element(s) of a List, separated by the given separator.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        itemList -
        separator -
        lambda - See getArrayStr(Object[], String, LambdaToString).
        Returns:
        The representative string or an empty string if the list was null or empty.

      • getArrayStr

        public static <T> java.lang.String getArrayStr​(T[] itemList,
                                               java.lang.String separator,
                                               Utils.LambdaToString lambda)
        Get a string representing all element(s) of an array, separated by the given separator.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        itemList -
        separator -
        lambda - A Utils.LambdaToString that takes an element of the itemList and generates its string representation that will be in the output. If set to null, this string representation will be generated by the Object.toString() method of the element.
        Returns:
        The representative string or an empty string if the array was null or empty.

      • populateSpinner

        public static <T> void populateSpinner​(java.util.ArrayList<T> spinnerList,
                                       Spinner spinner,
                                       Utils.GetSelectedIndex lambda,
                                       Context context,
                                       Utils.OnItemSelected listener)
        Populate a spinner using the provided parameters. If the lambda provided selected index is not negative, will set spinner to select at this index.

        Parameters:
        spinnerList -
        spinner -
        lambda - Utils.GetSelectedIndex Lambda.
